All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
This class contains all the logic for the add appointment form
AddCustomerController
This class contains all the logic for the add customer form
AppointmentFilter
This class contains logic for filtering appointments in the view appointments list form
AppointmentQuery
This class contains performs CRUD(create, read, update, delete) queries on appointment data from the appointments table in the database and associated contact information in the database
Appointments
This class creates appointment objects
AppointmentTimes
This class provides logic for other appointment classes
ConfirmationAlert
This class provides logic for confirmation alerts used throughout the project
Contacts
This class creates contact objects
ContactsQuery
This class contains performs read queries on contact data from the contacts table in the database
Countries
This class creates country objects and works with the CountriesList enum
CountriesList
This enum contains all Countries and their associated names and IDs that matches the database.
CustomerQuery
This class contains performs CRUD(create, read, update, delete) queries on customer data from the customers table in the database
Customers
This class creates customer objects
DBConnection
This class contains logic for opening the connection to the database
FirstLevelDivisions
This class creates First Level Division objects
FirstLevelDivisionsQuery
This class contains performs read queries on FirstLevelDivisions data from the FirstLevelDivisions table in the database
IAlertOMatic
This interface provides a template for logic in the ConfirmationAlert class
InformationAlert
This class provides logic for information alerts used throuhout the project
LoginAuthentication
This class provides logic for authenticating the data in the Login Screen form
LoginScreenController
This class contains logic for the login screen
MainApplication
This class creates an app that manages customers, appointment scheduling, and contacts
MainMenuScreenController
This class contains logic for the main menu screen
ReportsScreenController
This class provides logic for the reports screen
TimezoneConversions
This class provides logic for Timezone conversions used throughout the project
UpdateAppointmentController
This class contains all the logic for the update appointment form
UpdateCustomerController
This class contains all the logic for the update customer form
UserQuery
This class contains performs read queries on users data from the users table in the database and associated contact information in the database
Users
This class creates Users objects
ViewAppointmentListController
This class contains logic for the view appointments list class
ViewCustomerListController
This class contains logic for the view customers form
